<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Billing Summary</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/billing/summary"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Access a summary of billing information, providing an overview of the user's financial status.
